title: Reddit - The heart of the internet
text: Is Phasmaphobia worth it? Hi there, couple of friends picked up phasmaphobia yesterday. I was thinking about buying it but I wanted to get the communities perspective. I am not too into horror games. The only real reason I thought of picking the game up was because my friends bought it. I will be mainly playing co-op a the game looks most fun that way. When they are not on, Does the game have a active lfg community? That is all, Thanks!
